Add in beef stock, water, garlic

and bottom. Cut the crown off the top half, so top
and bottom are same size. Then bake at 325F for

When the soup is done, spoon 1 cup
into an oven-safe bowl, and place a crouton on top.
Lay a slice of provolone cheese on top, and sprinkle
